thread.title: Kershaw gets 300 strikeouts, 1st pitcher to do it since 2002
thread.title_full: Kershaw gets 300 strikeouts, 1st pitcher to do it since 2002

author: senh
title: Kershaw gets 300 strikeouts, 1st pitcher to do it since 2002
text: BING NEWS: Kershaw gets 300 strikeouts, 1st pitcher to do it since 2002 LOS ANGELES (AP) - Clayton Kershaw of the Los Angeles Dodgers recorded his 300th strikeout of the season, becoming the first major league pitcher in 13 years to do so. Kershaw had seven strikeouts in 3 2-3 innings Sunday against the San Diego Padres ... 10/4/2015 - 10:07 am | View Link Kershaw gets 300 strikeouts, 1st pitcher to do it since 2002 Kershaw gets 300 strikeouts, 1st pitcher to do it since 2002 LOS ANGELES (AP) - Clayton Kershaw of the Los Angeles Dodgers recorded his 300th strikeout of the season, becoming the first major league pitcher in 13 years to do so.
